entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Wreckhouse
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:35 PM NST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.3°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 60%
